title: Gone with the Wind
description: A manipulative Southern belle carries on a turbulent affair with a blockade runner during the American Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

title: The Wizard of Oz
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Original Song (Over the Rainbow)
description: Young Dorothy Gale and her dog Toto are swept away by a tornado from their Kansas farm to the magical Land of Oz, and embark on a quest with three new friends to see the Wizard.

title: Mr. Smith Goes to Washington
description: A naive youth leader is appointed to fill a vacancy in the U.S. Senate. His idealistic plans promptly collide with corruption at home and conflict with his hero, the senior senator.

title: Stagecoach
description: A group of people traveling on a stagecoach find their journey complicated by the threat of Geronimo and learn something about each other in the process.

title: Wuthering Heights
description: A servant in the house of Wuthering Heights tells a traveler the unfortunate tale of lovers Heathcliff and Cathy.

title: Ninotchka
description: A stern Russian woman sent to Paris on official business finds herself attracted to a man who represents everything she is supposed to detest.

title: The Rules of the Game
description: A bourgeois life in France at the onset of World War II, as the rich and their poor servants meet up at a French chateau.

title: Goodbye, Mr. Chips
description: An aged teacher looks back over his long career, including his days as a starched young schoolmaster, his courtship and marriage, and the horrors of World War I.

title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
description: In 15th-century France, a gypsy girl is framed for murder by the infatuated Chief Justice, and only the deformed bellringer of Notre Dame Cathedral can save her.

title: Only Angels Have Wings
description: At a remote South American trading port, the manager of an air freight company is forced to risk his pilots' lives in order to win a major contract.

title: Dark Victory
description: A young socialite is diagnosed with an inoperable brain tumor and must decide whether to meet her final days with dignity or live them up wildly.

title: Young Mr. Lincoln
description: A fictionalized account of the early life of the American president as a young lawyer facing his greatest court case.

title: Gunga Din
description: Three British soldiers and a native waterbearer must stop a Thuggee cult from starting an uprising in 19th-century British India.

title: The Women
description: A wealthy New Yorker unaware of her husband's infidelity is surrounded by a circle of gossip-mongering friends who make matters worse.

title: The Roaring Twenties
description: Three army friends return from WWI and drift apart, but their lives intersect again during the Prohibition era of the 1920s.

title: Love Affair
description: A French playboy and an American former nightclub singer fall in love aboard a ship and agree to reunite six months later at the Empire State Building.

title: Destry Rides Again
description: A mild-mannered deputy who doesn't like guns is called to tame a lawless town, where he meets a feisty saloon singer.

title: Of Mice and Men
description: Two migrant field workers in California during the Great Depression—one witty but cynical, the other strong but mentally disabled—dream of having their own farm.

title: Midnight
description: An unemployed American showgirl stranded in Paris is hired by an aristocrat to seduce the gigolo who is pursuing his wife.

title: Beau Geste
description: Three brothers join the French Foreign Legion in North Africa after one of them takes the blame for the theft of a valuable family jewel.

title: The Private Lives of Elizabeth and Essex
description: A fictionalized account of the tumultuous romance between Queen Elizabeth I and the Earl of Essex, which threatens to destroy the kingdom.

title: Drums Along the Mohawk
description: Newlyweds on the New York frontier must protect their farm and survive Indian attacks during the American Revolutionary War.

title: Intermezzo
description: A famous violinist has a passionate affair with his daughter's piano teacher during an interval in his marriage.

title: The Hound of the Baskervilles
description: Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson investigate the legend of a supernatural hound that may be stalking a young heir on the moors of Devonshire.

title: Son of Frankenstein
description: Baron Wolf von Frankenstein returns to his family castle, where he discovers his father's Monster and tries to clear the family name by reviving him.

title: Dodge City
description: A cattle agent in Kansas accepts the job of sheriff in the lawless town of Dodge City to bring justice to a gang of outlaws.

title: Bachelor Mother
description: When a shopgirl finds a foundling baby on a doorstep, the world and her boss mistakenly assume it is hers.

title: Another Thin Man
description: Nick and Nora Charles return with their new baby and dog Asta to investigate the murder of a Cuban estate owner on Long Island.

title: Union Pacific
oscars_won_details: Honorary Award (To the studio for the movie)
description: The construction of the railroad across the West is impeded by sabotage, Indian attacks, and a love triangle.

title: Babes in Arms
description: A group of talented teenagers put on a show to prove to their vaudevillian parents that they can make it in show business.

title: Jesse James
description: After railroad agents kill their mother, brothers Jesse and Frank James turn to a life of crime to get revenge.

title: The Little Princess
description: A young girl is relegated to servitude at a boarding school when her father goes missing during the Second Boer War.

title: The Story of Vernon and Irene Castle
description: A biopic of the famous dance team who rose to fame in the early 20th century, only to face tragedy during World War I.

title: The Four Feathers
description: A British officer resigns his commission on the eve of battle in the Sudan, and must redeem his honor by helping his friends in disguise.

title: Golden Boy
description: A talented young violinist is torn between his passion for music and the financial rewards of being a professional boxer.

title: Jamaica Inn
description: In Cornwall, a young woman discovers that the inn run by her aunt and uncle is a front for a gang of pirates who wreck ships.

title: Confessions of a Nazi Spy
description: An FBI agent investigates a Nazi spy ring operating within the United States in this controversial, pre-war political thriller.

title: Juarez
description: The story of Mexican President Benito Juarez and his fight against the French-installed puppet Emperor Maximilian von Habsburg.

title: Gulliver's Travels
description: A shipwrecked sailor washes ashore on the island of Lilliput, where the tiny inhabitants are at war with a neighboring island.

title: The Old Maid
description: A woman allows her cousin to raise her illegitimate daughter to give the child a better life, leading to years of jealousy and secrets.

title: Five Came Back
description: A commercial airliner crashes in the Amazon jungle, forcing the passengers to repair the plane while facing headhunters and internal conflict.

title: Daybreak
description: A factory worker kills a man and barricades himself in his apartment, recalling the tragic romance that led to the murder as police surround him.
